meanings.definition: To put in danger or at risk
meanings.sent1: The reckless actions imperilled the fragile ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: She imperilled her own safety by walking alone in the dark alley.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel imperilled the picnic by stealing all the food.
meanings.sent4: His careless behavior imperilled the success of the project.
meanings.sent5: The villain's plan imperilled the lives of innocent civilians.
